## AddIgnoredParams interface

The parameters needed for the [SuggestIgnoreParams.addIgnored()](./prosemirror-suggest.suggestignoreparams.addignored.md) action method available to the suggest plugin handlers.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AddIgnoredParams extends RemoveIgnoredParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [specific](./prosemirror-suggest.addignoredparams.specific.md) | <code>false</code> | When <code>false</code> this will ignore the range for all matching suggesters. When true the ignored suggesters will only be the one provided by the name. |

## Remarks

See: - [RemoveIgnoredParams](./prosemirror-suggest.removeignoredparams.md)
